com.adobe.primetime.va.simple
Interface MediaHeartbeat.MediaHeartbeatDelegate

Enclosing class:
MediaHeartbeat
public static interface MediaHeartbeat.MediaHeartbeatDelegate

Method Summary
 java.lang.Double getCurrentPlaybackTime()
          Current position of the playhead.
 MediaObject getQoSObject()
          Returns the ADBMediaObject instance containing current QoS information.
 

Method Detail

getQoSObject

MediaObject getQoSObject()
Returns the ADBMediaObject instance containing current QoS information. This method can be called multiple times during a playback session. Player implementation must always return the most recently available QoS data.

getCurrentPlaybackTime

java.lang.Double getCurrentPlaybackTime()
Current position of the playhead. For VOD, value is specified in seconds from the beginning of the media item. For live streaming, return playhead position if available or the current UTC time in seconds otherwise.
